trans-unit.source: Represents a workflow that executes activities sequentially.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un flusso di lavoro che esegue le attività in sequenza.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SequentialWorkflowActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> with `Initialized` and `Completed` events for optional processing of parameters.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]È il SequentialWorkflowActivity un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>con `Initialized` e `Completed` gli eventi per l'elaborazione facoltativa di parametri.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>

trans-unit.source: This makes it particularly useful as a top-level activity when you design sequential-style workflows.
trans-unit.target: Ciò risulta particolarmente utile come un'attività di primo livello durante la progettazione di flussi di lavoro sequenziale stile.

trans-unit.source: The SequentialWorkflowActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the SequentialWorkflowActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: È il SequentialWorkflowActivity un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, ovvero il SequentialWorkflowActivity può contenere altre attività.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"></xref> class by using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"> </xref> classe utilizzando il nome dell'attività.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'attività definita dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow has finished.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica al termine il flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> che fa riferimento il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> in which dynamic updates can be made in the workflow, when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> in cui gli aggiornamenti dinamici può essere eseguita nel flusso di lavoro, quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> that identifies when dynamic updates can be made.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> che identifica quando possono essere eseguiti gli aggiornamenti dinamici.

trans-unit.source: Runs the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> associato il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> at the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"></xref> at the end of the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> nel <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"> </xref> alla fine dell'operazione richiesta.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene inizializzato il flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Initialized"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> che fa riferimento il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Initialized"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.CompletedEvent"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.CompletedEvent"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> associato il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: executionContext is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: executionContextè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).
